text: Yalli isi farmoyta Nabii Mucammad åzsaíeńíķ- addunyaa kee akeeral kaa qokle waam yakkale num, toysa isi qarih amot akat yaxxawway ise edde ogisay, tohuk lakat is edde sorkoocisamkeh (Quntuurisam) edde Rabba yan fanah, tokkel kay keydi usuk naqabuk lem kaak kalamkeh wagitay, Yalli Nabii qokle waam yekkelek
